description:
Go Hands-Free with this premium quality "One Touch Quick Release" Mount Holder that fits almost any device, cell phones, iPods, iPhones, PDAs, Smartphones, GPS, Portable Navigation, MP3 Players and more. STRONG GRIP and SECURE MOUNTS. 

Fully adjustable secure arm locks in place with touch of a button. Made with high quality plastic. Skeleton style arm provides super strong and solid support. Fully adjustable ball joint allows the base 360 degree rotate, tilt and turn. This mount comes with Windshields Suction Cup. Quick release one touch botton releases device and tightens as you squeeze arms. 

The base is covered with soft foam pads to protect your valuable device from scratches and shocks.
title: Clipper Car Mount Universal Vehicle Swivel Holder For Samsung Galaxy Note 2 N7100 (FlyStone Black/Red)
